Measurement.name: Is the system configured to use Relationship Management on Organisations and Persons?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PB WHERE ISNULL(ID_FI, 0) != 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PB WHERE ISNULL(ID_PE, 0) != 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PB

Measurement.name: Good adoption of relationship types?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Beziehungsart) FROM {tablePrefix}PB WHERE Beziehungsart != 0) = (SELECT COUNT(Code) FROM {tablePrefix}KA WHERE KatNr = 213 and ExtKey != '' and KatSperre = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT TOP 1 TotalRelations FROM( SELECT Beziehungsart, COUNT(*) as TotalRelations FROM {tablePrefix}PB WHERE Beziehungsart != 0 GROUP BY Beziehungsart ) vw ORDER BY TotalRelations) > 50 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is a Connector implemented for automated sync of tasks?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}A1 INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}XK ON {tablePrefix}A1.ID = {tablePrefix}XK.ID_GENERIC WHERE DateiKurzk = 'A1'

Measurement.name: Real time interface set up between backend system and CRM to sync stock levels?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}B6 INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}XK ON {tablePrefix}B6.ID = {tablePrefix}XK.ID_GENERIC WHERE DateiKurzk = 'B6') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is a Connector implemented for automated sync of activities?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}MA WHERE dbo.{tablePrefix}RkzPart(4201, RKZ) = 20
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}MA

Measurement.name: Measure engagement level per sales rep

SqlQueries.Query: WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT ID, BeaId FROM {tablePrefix}MA WHERE BeaId != 0 AND Neu BETWEEN CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -3, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT) AND CAST(FORMAT(GETDATE(),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT)) SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*)/(3 * COUNT(DISTINCT BeaId)) END FROM CTE_MA

Measurement.name: Have all occured visits/calls a visit report?

SqlQueries.Query: WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT ID, BeaId FROM {tablePrefix}MA WHERE [Status] = 0 AND BeaId != 0 AND Neu BETWEEN CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -3, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT) AND CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT)) SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CEILING(COUNT(*)/(3 * COUNT(DISTINCT BeaId))) END FROM CTE_MA

WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT ID, BeaId FROM {tablePrefix}MA ma WHERE [Status] = 1 AND BeaId != 0 AND LEN(ISNULL([Text], '')) < 10 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}D3 WHERE ID_GENERIC = ma.ID) = 0 AND Neu BETWEEN CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -3, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT) AND CAST(FORMAT(GETDATE(),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT)) SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CEILING(COUNT(*)/(3 * COUNT(DISTINCT BeaId))) END FROM CTE_MA

Measurement.name: Are the visit/call reports well structured so they can be analysed (free text)?

SqlQueries.Query: WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) As TotalActivities, SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL([Text], '')) != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivitiesWithText FROM {tablePrefix}MA ) SELECT CEILING(ActivitiesWithText*100/TotalActivities) FROM CTE_MA

WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) As TotalActivities, SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL([Text], '')) > 250 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivitiesWithText FROM {tablePrefix}MA ) SELECT CEILING(ActivitiesWithText*100/TotalActivities) FROM CTE_MA

Measurement.name: Are discussion topics enabled in the system (and used)?

SqlQueries.Query: WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) As TotalActivities, SUM(CASE WHEN F5000 != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivitiesWithObjectives FROM {tablePrefix}MA ) SELECT CEILING(ActivitiesWithObjectives*100/TotalActivities) FROM CTE_MA

WITH CTE_MA AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) As TotalActivities, SUM(CASE WHEN F5004 != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivitiesWithAchievements FROM {tablePrefix}MA ) SELECT CEILING(ActivitiesWithAchievements*100/TotalActivities) FROM CTE_MA

Measurement.name: Not too much documents?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}D1 WHERE Neu >= CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -1, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') AS BIGINT)
SELECT CEILING((SUM(ISNULL(DkLaenge, 0))*1.0/(1024*1024*1024))) FROM {tablePrefix}D1

WITH CTE_D1 AS ( SELECT (SUM(ISNULL(DkLaenge, 0))*1.0/(1024*1024*1024)) AS Size, SUBSTRING(CAST(Neu AS VARCHAR(20)), 1, 4) AS [Year] FROM {tablePrefix}D1 WHERE Neu BETWEEN CAST(format(DATEADD(year, -3, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') as bigint) AND CAST(format(getdate(),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') as bigint) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(CAST(Neu AS VARCHAR(20)), 1, 4)) SELECT CEILING(AVG(Size)) FROM CTE_D1

Measurement.name: All accounts have their visiting hours maintained

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CEILING((COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ID_FI)*100.0)/COUNT(fi.ID)) FROM {tablePrefix}FI fi LEFT OUTER JOIN {tablePrefix}CT ct ON fi.ID = ct.ID_FI AND ct.Typ = 1

Measurement.name: Is Managing Events enabled?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}CM WHERE KampTyp = 1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Has the Suggestions functionality been set up for Orders?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}SV) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is customer behavioral data stored per organisation and natural person and reported on through the Customer Journey timeline?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER ph ON sc.configid = ph.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI' INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER_BUTTONS phb ON ph.headerid = phb.headerid WHERE phb.directbuttonname in ('TE_OJ_Timeline', 'TE_FI_AccountTimeline', 'TE_FI_MarketingTimeline', 'TE_Y1_Timeline')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Case management process implemented to enforce required workflow?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}KM) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is a graphical relationship view, which shows direct and indirect relationships, available?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM pmi ON sc.configid = pmi.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI' INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUENTRY pme ON pmi.menuid = pme.menuid where pmi.visible = 1 AND (pmi.label like '%A_CircleOfInfluence%' OR pme.menuentry like '%A_CircleOfInfluence%')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Are at least 2 Relationship Levels represented in the graph?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PB pb1 WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM {tablePrefix}PB pb2 WHERE pb2.ID_FI = pb1.ID_FI2 OR pb2.ID_PE = pb1.ID_PE2)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Are routes adjusted based on data and events?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: How much sources and events have been set up to influence the planning of routes?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Is there an approval/reimbursement process in place?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}B2) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Are expenses linked to the corresponding Sales Activities?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}B2 WHERE TAB_GENERIC IN ('MA', 'Y1', 'PR', 'AU')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Storing data on won/lost deals with information which competitors you won/lost against?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}Y1)>0 THEN (SELECT CEILING((SELECT COUNT(*)*100.0 FROM {tablePrefix}Y1 Y1 INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}Y2 Y2 ON Y1.ID = Y2.ID_Y1 INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}FI FI ON Y2.ID_FI = FI.ID WHERE Y1.[Status] IN (2, 3) AND FI.Fityp = 0 AND Y1.Upd BETWEEN CAST(format(DATEADD(year, -1, GETDATE()),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') as bigint) AND CAST(format(getdate(),'yyyyMMddHHmmssfff') as bigint))/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}Y1))) ELSE 0 END

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: For how much of the cases in the system has a question been generated in Jive?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Can you assign an engineer based on the planning and availability of the field engineer?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM pmi ON sc.configid = pmi.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI' INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUENTRY pme ON pmi.menuid = pme.menuid where pmi.visible = 1 AND (pmi.label like '%ID_NET_DISPATCHING_DASHBOARD%' OR pme.menuentry like '%ID_NET_DISPATCHING_DASHBOARD%')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: is it possible to assign cases to agents and/or fields engineers based on a match between certain attributes of the case and the agent/engineer (eg. based on expertise)?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}SI) > 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}MA) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Opportunity Sales Funnel is in use

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM pmi ON sc.configid = pmi.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI' INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUENTRY pme ON pmi.menuid = pme.menuid where pmi.visible = 1 AND (pmi.label like '%TE_ID_NET_OpportunitySalesFunnel%' OR pme.menuentry like '%TE_ID_NET_OpportunitySalesFunnel%')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Do reps have the functionality to manually plan routes between relations based on proximity?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}ID WHERE ID IN ( SELECT BeaId FROM {tablePrefix}SV WHERE ID_FI > 0 AND Latitude > 0 AND Longitude > 0 )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is there a regular sync set up to keep all SKU's and prices up to date in the Item Master?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}AR AR INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}XK XK ON AR.ID = XK.ID_GENERIC WHERE XK.DateiKurzk = 'AR') > 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PL PL INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}XK XK ON PL.ID = XK.ID_GENERIC WHERE XK.DateiKurzk = 'PL') > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Are you storing service levels agreed in service contracts in the system, enabling you to measure solving/responding to cases based on service level compliance per customer?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}WR) > 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}WP) > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Surveys set up for lead qualification?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}U1 U1 INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}FI FI ON U1.ID_FI = FI.ID OR (U1.ID_GENERIC = FI.ID AND U1.LinkTyp = 'FI')) >0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Predictive CRM enabled?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Has Serial Entry been set up?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER ph ON sc.configid = ph.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI' INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER_BUTTONS phb ON ph.headerid = phb.headerid INNER JOIN PORTAL_DIRECTBUTTONS pdb ON phb.directbuttonname = pdb.name INNER JOIN PORTAL_PAGE_CALLPARAMETERS ppcp ON pdb.refid = ppcp.Refid where ppcp.ParameterName = 'Command' AND ArgValue LIKE '%SerialEntry%') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Planning values are present for previous year, current year and next year

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}FC FC WHERE Jahr = YEAR(GETDATE()) - 1 AND (Soll_M1 > 0 OR Soll_M2 > 0 OR Soll_M3 > 0 OR Soll_M4 > 0 OR Soll_M5 > 0 OR Soll_M6 > 0 OR Soll_M7 > 0 OR Soll_M8 > 0 OR Soll_M9 > 0 OR Soll_M10 > 0 OR Soll_M11 > 0 OR Soll_M12 > 0)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}FC FC WHERE Jahr = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND (Soll_M1 > 0 OR Soll_M2 > 0 OR Soll_M3 > 0 OR Soll_M4 > 0 OR Soll_M5 > 0 OR Soll_M6 > 0 OR Soll_M7 > 0 OR Soll_M8 > 0 OR Soll_M9 > 0 OR Soll_M10 > 0 OR Soll_M11 > 0 OR Soll_M12 > 0)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}FC FC WHERE Jahr = YEAR(GETDATE()) + 1 AND (Soll_M1 > 0 OR Soll_M2 > 0 OR Soll_M3 > 0 OR Soll_M4 > 0 OR Soll_M5 > 0 OR Soll_M6 > 0 OR Soll_M7 > 0 OR Soll_M8 > 0 OR Soll_M9 > 0 OR Soll_M10 > 0 OR Soll_M11 > 0 OR Soll_M12 > 0)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Agreements for current year are in place

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}FC WHERE Jahr = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND F5000 = 3) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Mobile Sample Management set up?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Is Mobile Property Management set up?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI_TABLET'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT * FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM pmi ON sc.configid = pmi.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI_TABLET' INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUENTRY pme ON pmi.menuid = pme.menuid where pmi.visible = 1 AND (pmi.label like '%TE_LIST_OJ%' OR pme.menuentry like '%TE_LIST_OJ%') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Mobile Offer Management set up?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI_TABLET'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT * FROM sub_config sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM pmi ON sc.configid = pmi.configid and sc.name != 'TE_ISI_TABLET' INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUENTRY pme ON pmi.menuid = pme.menuid where pmi.visible = 1 AND (pmi.label like '%LIST_PR%' OR pme.menuentry like '%LIST_PR%') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Mobile Order Management set up?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Is Mobile Sales Planning set up?

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT 0

Measurement.name: Is Reporting set up?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config AS sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_PAGEREF AS pr ON sc.configid = pr.configid INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUACTION AS ma ON pr.refid = ma.refid INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM AS mi ON ma.menuid = mi.menuid WHERE pr.pagename IN ('ExecuteReport', 'QueryReport') ) > 0 OR ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config AS sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_PAGEREF AS pr ON sc.configid = pr.configid INNER JOIN PORTAL_DIRECTBUTTONS AS db ON db.refid = pr.refid INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER_BUTTONS AS hb ON hb.directbuttonname = db.name INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER AS h ON h.headerid = hb.headerid WHERE pr.pagename IN ('ExecuteReport', 'QueryReport') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: Is Route Planning set up?

SqlQueries.Query:
;WITH sub_config AS ( SELECT configid, name, 1 AS relative_depth FROM PORTAL_CONFIG WHERE name = 'TE_ISI'
UNION ALL
SELECT config.configid, config.name, sc.relative_depth + 1 FROM PORTAL_CONFIG config, sub_config sc WHERE config.parentid = sc.configid ) SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config AS sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_PAGEREF AS pr ON sc.configid = pr.configid INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUACTION AS ma ON pr.refid = ma.refid INNER JOIN PORTAL_MENUITEM AS mi ON ma.menuid = mi.menuid WHERE pr.pagename IN ('VisitPlanning') ) > 0 OR ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sub_config AS sc INNER JOIN PORTAL_PAGEREF AS pr ON sc.configid = pr.configid INNER JOIN PORTAL_DIRECTBUTTONS AS db ON db.refid = pr.refid INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER_BUTTONS AS hb ON hb.directbuttonname = db.name INNER JOIN PORTAL_HEADER AS h ON h.headerid = hb.headerid WHERE pr.pagename IN ('VisitPlanning') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measurement.name: All signed completed service offers, all completed service offers with linked installed base

SqlQueries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PR WHERE F5045 = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tablePrefix}PR pr INNER {tablePrefix}AU au ON au.ID_PR = pr.ID INNER JOIN {tablePrefix}IB ib ON ib.ID_AU = au.ID;
